name: Ricky Iwasaki
title: Ri jerbal in software
summary: Juon ri kōmman software eo elap an jelālokjen, ej bukõt ien ko rekãl ñan jerbal ñan jerbal ko relap. Ej itoklimo in kōmmane ak kobaik code ñan an ro jet maroñ in kajerbale. Ij tõmak bwe kapeel ko aõ rej dik jen internet, innem ij lukkun itoklimo in jerbal ibben kein jerbal ko jet, jerbal ko, im kajin in būrookraam ko.

education.degree: Peba in mālim in Software Engineering

experience.title: Ri jerbal in software
responsibilities: Kar kōmmane im kōjerbal scalable web application ko ilo an kajerbal React im Node.js
Kar jerbal ibben ri lale men ko ñan kōmman bwe en emmanlok men ko rej aikuji im lale bwe ren itok ilo ien eo ejejjet
Kar kōmmane im lale RESTful API ko ñan web application ko
Kar kōmmane script ko ñan kōmman jerbal ko make im kōkōmanmanlok jerbal ko

experience.title: Ri jipan rikaki in tennis
responsibilities: Katakin kilen tennis ilo juon kumi in 5-10 ri ikkure ro
Kōmman bwe katak eo en emman im kamõnõnõ ñan ri ikkure ro
Eddo in kejbãrok ri ikkure ro ilo jikin ikkure eo, elaptata ri ikkure ro redik im rittolok, einwot 3 yio dettaer im 60 yio dettaer

experience.title: Outbound Associate
responsibilities: Bar likit men ko ilo shelf eo
Bōk order ko ñan ri wia ro ilo online
Kōmman order ko ilo truck in bōktok ko
Jipan ri wia ro ñan lo men ko ilo jikin wia eo
Kōjparok jikin wia eo bwe en erreo im jimwe
Kōjparok juon jikin eo ejjeḷọk jorrāān im em̧m̧an ñan ri-wia ro im rijerbal ro

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Juon website eo ej kwalok jerbal ko im kapeel ko ilo an kajerbal kein jerbal ko rekāāl
